SELECT openID, (score + usedScore) AS score, usedScore, b.realName as userName, userImg FROM t_user a join t_jobnum b on a.jobNum = b.jobNum ORDER BY (score + usedScore) DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(userID) FROM t_user where (score + usedScore) > #{score}

SELECT *, (score + usedScore) AS score
FROM t_user where (score + usedScore) = #{score}
